mapper.select: select sp.policy_id as "policyId", sp.policy_title as "policyTitle" from tb_policy sp where 1=1 and sp.status='1' and sp.record_status='1' and sp.policy_type=#{policyType}

select sp.policy_id as "policyId" ,sp.policy_code as "policyCode" ,sp.policy_level_code as "policyLevelCode" ,sp.policy_level_name as "policyLevelName" ,sp.policy_class_code as "policyClassCode" ,sp.policy_class_name as "policyClassName" ,sp.thematic_type as "thematicType" ,sp.policy_title as "policyTitle" ,sp.read_num as "readNum" ,date_format(sp.release_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as "releaseDate" ,sp.status as "status" ,sp.support_method as "supportMethod" ,sp.support_industry as "supportIndustry" ,sp.issue_unit as "issueUnit" ,sp.is_policy_diagram as "isPolicyDiagram" ,spd.policy_content as "policyContent" from tb_policy sp left join tb_policy_details spd on sp.policy_id=spd.policy_id where 1=1 and sp.record_status='1' and sp.policy_id=#{policyId}
